sqlMap.select: select user_id,group_name,user_name from USER_INFO where user_name =#user_name# AND password =SHA1(#password#)

select ug.menu_item_id,ug.authority,menu.menu_item_name from USER_GROUP ug,USER_INFO ui,MENU_ITEMS_LIST menu where ug.menu_item_id=menu.menu_item_id AND ug.user_group_id=ui.group_name AND ui.user_name=#user_id#;

select ufa.menu_item_id,ufa.authority,menu.menu_item_name from USER_FUNCTION_AUTHORITY ufa,USER_GROUP ug,USER_INFO ui,MENU_ITEMS_LIST menu where ug.menu_item_id=ufa.menu_item_id AND ufa.menu_item_id=menu.menu_item_id AND ug.authority=1 AND ug.user_group_id=ui.group_name AND ufa.function_user_id=ui.user_id AND ui.user_id=#user_id#;
select ufa.authority from USER_FUNCTION_AUTHORITY ufa,MENU_ITEMS_LIST menu where ufa.menu_item_id=menu.menu_item_id AND menu.menu_item_name=#page# AND ufa.function_user_id=#user_id#;

select ug.authority from USER_GROUP ug,MENU_ITEMS_LIST menu,USER_INFO ui where ug.menu_item_id=menu.menu_item_id AND menu.menu_item_name=#page# AND ug.user_group_id=ui.group_name AND ui.user_id=#user_id#;
